alert.note: Alert for Central Mountains; Eastern Juab, Millard Counties; Utah Valley; Wasatch Mountains South of I-80; Western Millard and Juab Counties (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 20 at 2:18PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northern Sanpete... northern Millard...east central Juab and southern Utah Counties through 300 PM MDT... At 216 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 14 miles west of Nephi to 13 miles north of Delta. Movement was east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Nephi, Mona, Leamington, Lynndyl, Little Sahara State Park and Jericho. This includes the following highways... Interstate 15 between mile markers 216 and 233. US Route 6 between mile markers 106 and 129. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Central Mountains; Eastern Juab, Millard Counties; Utah Valley; Wasatch Mountains South of I-80; Western Millard and Juab Counties
